name: princely
content:
the princely sum of
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to refer to a surprisingly small amount of money: She acquired the painting at a jumble sale for the princely sum of 25p.

Add to word list
(esp. of money) very large in amount: Advertisers pay a princely sum for prime-time commercials.
